	trait = education_diplomacy_4

		birth = yes
		employer = 1417017
	}

	902.1.1 = { employer = 1404564 }
	909.1.1 = { employer = 1404565 }
	926.1.1 = { employer = 1404566 }
	929.1.1 = {
		death={death_reason = death_murder_known killer = 1404568 }
	}
}

kan_01 = {
	name="Bozhou"
	dynasty=kan_dynasty
	religion="mahayana"
	culture="han"
	father=kan_04
	414.1.1={ # Unknown but installed in 460, and his sons were adults by c. 477
		birth=yes
	}
	477.3.24={ # Known year
		death=yes
	}
}
kan_02 = {
	name="Yicheng"
	dynasty=kan_dynasty
	religion="mahayana"
	culture="han"
	father = kan_01
	445.9.18={ # Unknown
		birth=yes
	}
	478.2.10={ # Known year
		death = {
			death_reason = death_murder_known
			killer = kan_03
		}
	}
}

kan_03 = {
	name="Shogui"
	dynasty=kan_dynasty
	religion="mahayana"
	culture="han"
	father = kan_01
	450.5.9={ # Unknown
		birth=yes
	}
	488.4.2={ # Known year
		death = {
			death_reason = death_murder # Killed by King Kezhiluo of the Gaoche Turks
		}
	}
}

# Probably not Kan Bozhou's father, but an elder kinsman
# However, cannot find any sources on how they are related
# Came from a prominent Han family in Gaochang and declared himself Prefect of Gaochang in 435 and worked with Northern Liang remnants
# Therefore, his existence early on is to represent independent Han interests in Gaochang
# Even though they were initially under the various Liang regimes
kan_04 = {
	name="Shuang"
	dynasty=kan_dynasty
	religion="mahayana"
	culture="han"
	377.1.9={ # Unknown
		birth=yes
	}
	452.4.30={ # Unknown
		death = yes
	}
}

zhang_gaochang_01 = {
	name="Mengming"
	dynasty = zhang_dynasty_gaochang
	religion="mahayana"
	culture="han"
	460.1.5={ # Known year
		birth=yes
	}
	476.1.1 = {
		employer = liang_013 # He was originally from Dunhuang
	}
	496.6.1={ # Known year
		death = {
			death_reason = death_murder # Killed by locals for being a crap king I guess
		}
	}
}

# High ranking official in Gaochang during Ma Ru's reign, therefore I roughly estimate he was at least ~40 years old by 500
gong_01 = {
	name="Guli"
	dynasty = gong_dynasty_gaochang
	religion="mahayana"
	culture="han"
	trait=education_stewardship_3 # High ranking administrative official
	459.8.6={ # Unknown
		birth=yes
	}
	476.1.1 = {
		employer = kan_01
	}
	517.4.22={ # Unknown
		death = yes
	}
}

# Ma Ru, Replaced Zhang Mingmeng
# Later agreed to move the whole populace of Gaochang deeper into Northern Wei territory
# The locals thought that was a dumbass plan, so they killed him
ma_01 = {
	name="Ru"
	dynasty = ma_dynasty_gaochang
	religion="mahayana"
	culture="han"
	451.6.8={ # Unknown
		birth=yes
	}
	476.1.1 = {
		employer = kan_01
	}
	501.3.1={ # Known year
		death = {
			death_reason = death_murder # Killed by locals because they didn't want to move
		}
	}
}

ma_02 = {
	name="Yishu"
	dynasty = ma_dynasty_gaochang
	religion="mahayana"
	culture="han"
	father = ma_01
	475.4.15={ # Unknown
		birth=yes
	}
	501.3.1={ # Unknown
		death = {
			death_reason = death_murder # Not sure if he was killed along with father, but I decided to just make it so
		}
	}
}

# Qu Jia's fictitious father to connect him with his brother Chong

# Qu Jia, first Gaochang king of the Qu dynasty
qu_02 = {
	name="Jia"
	dynasty = qu_dynasty_gaochang
	religion="mahayana"
	culture="han"
	father=qu_01
	456.11.16={ # Unknown
		birth=yes
	}
	525.2.15={ # Unknown

# Duan Ye, First Emperor of Northern Liang, puppet of the Juqu clan
liang_001 = { 
	name= "Ye"
	dynasty = dynasty_duan
	religion="mahayana"
	culture="han"
	trait = education_diplomacy_1 	# Nice guy who was manipulated by the Juqu, apparently
	trait = trusting				# Overly trusted witchcraft and magic
	trait = compassionate			# Said to be very kind
	trait = just					# Cared about being just and good to all
	intrigue = 2					# Easily manipulated by others
	352.9.14 = { # Official of Former Qin, which lasted from c. 350-390
		birth = yes
	}
	383.1.1 = {
		add_spouse = liang_003
	}
	401.7.1 = { # Unknown
		death = yes
	}
}

# Duan Ye's unnamed son
liang_002 = { 
	name= "Hong"
	dynasty = dynasty_duan
	religion="mahayana"
	culture="han"
	father=liang_001
	mother=liang_003
	388.2.10 = { # Unknown
		birth = yes
	}
	401.7.1 = { # Unknown
		death = yes
	}
}

	name= "Gao"
	dynasty = dynasty_li_liang

	culture="han"
	diplomacy = 6 # Elegant in manners
	martial = 6

	trait=strategist

	trait=generous			# Considered very generous
	trait=just				# Benevolence! Benevolent rule
	trait=compassionate		# Benevolent rule
	trait=calm				# Gentle and modest but firm temperament
	father=western_liang_001
	mother=western_liang_002
	351.7.16 = { 
		birth = yes
	}
	361.1.1 = {		
		set_relation_friend = character:western_liang_004	
		set_relation_friend = character:liang_007	
		#set_relation_friend = character:liang_004
	}
	367.1.1 = {
		add_spouse = western_liang_006
	}

		add_spouse = western_liang_007

		death = yes
	}

# Li Rou - Li Gao's great-grandfather, confusingly English wikipedia skips him in the Li family tree while Chinese wikipedia doesn't
# He is mentioned in other Chinese sources I found online as Li Yong's son
# Was the prefect of Beidi for the Jin Dynasty, which is actually on the map around the Duchy of Wuluhai
western_liang_037 = { 
	name= "Rou"
	dynasty = dynasty_li_liang
	religion="zhengyi"
	culture="han"
	father=western_liang_040
	trait=education_learning_3 # Scholar
	255.8.15 = { # Date of birth given as c. 255
		birth = yes
	}
	307.8.4 = { # Unknown
		death = yes
	}
}

# Li Gao's grandmother
# Coincidentally had the last name Liang, just like the Liang kingdom/dynasty
# Plus, Li Gao's grandfather original name was Li Liang
# So the ruler of Former Liang, Zhang Jun (307-346) joked about Li Yan's kids and grandkids not knowing whether to address Zhang Jun as uncle or not
# Due to the confusion between all the names
# Anyways, this places her as being alive sometime around 324-346 when Zhang Jun ruled
western_liang_039 = { 
	name= "Jinfeng" # Name unknown
	female=yes
	dynasty = dynasty_liang_han
	religion="zhengyi"
	culture="han"
	305.7.9 = { # Unknown
		birth = yes
	}
	366.9.3 = { # Unknown
		death = yes
	}
}

# Meng Min, Li Gao's original boss and governor of Dunhuang whom he succeeded

	name= "Meng"
	dynasty = dynasty_min_liang
	religion="zhengyi"
	culture="han"
	# Traits reflect him being most famous for building a large canal/irrigation network in Dunhuang
	# The people of the prefecture built a temple called Meng Temple to venerate him after he passed away
	trait=education_stewardship_4 
	trait=architect
	trait=diligent
	trait=generous
	trait=just		
	342.7.10 = { # Unknown but made him old enough to be a vassal of Dunhuang in 361
		birth = yes
	}
	361.1.1 = {
		add_spouse = western_liang_044
	}
	395.1.1 = {
		add_trait = ill # Try to kill him off earlier
	}
	400.1.1 = { # Sometime in 400
		death = yes
	}
}

#############################################################
# 
# FORMER LIANG - ZHANG FAMILY
# 
# Ruled Liang from 320-376
# 
# Done by Cybrxkhan
# 
#############################################################

# Zhang Lie
# Grandfather of Zhang Gui, the first major leader of the family
# Magistrate of Waihuang under the Cao Wei Dynasty
# Descendant of Zhang Er, a vassal king under the early Han Dynasty
former_liang_001 = { 
	name= "Lie"
	dynasty = dynasty_zhang_liang
	religion="zhengyi"
	culture="han"
	trait=education_learning_3	# Came from a family specializing in Confucian learning
	201.12.14 = { # Unknown, but his son and Zhang Gui's father, Zhang Wen, was also a Cao Wei official, and Zhang Gui was born in 255 so I reasoned from there
		birth = yes
	}	
	267.8.10 = { # Unknown
		death = yes
	}
}

# Zhang Wen
# Father of Zhang Gui
# Some kind of Cao Wei Dynasty official
former_liang_002 = { 
	name= "Wen"
	dynasty = dynasty_zhang_liang
	religion="zhengyi"
	culture="han"
	father=former_liang_001
	trait=education_learning_3	# Came from a family specializing in Confucian learning
	229.10.6 = { # Unknown, but Zhang Gui and his brother Zhang Su served as Western Jin officials and Zhang Gui was born in 255 so I reasoned from there
		birth = yes
	}	
	287.6.3 = { # Unknown
		death = yes
	}
}

# Zhang Gui
# Forefather of Former Liang
# Governor of what would later become Liang
former_liang_003 = { 
	name= "Gui"
	dynasty = dynasty_zhang_liang
	religion="zhengyi"
	culture="han"
	father=former_liang_002
	trait=education_learning_3	# Came from a family specializing in Confucian learning
	trait=intellect_good_1		# Said to be intelligent in his youth
	trait=just 					# Also said to be loyal to the Jin and did not shirk from duty
	trait=diligent				# Studious and talented
	trait=generous				# Helped refugees and others or something...?
	255.2.8 = { # Known year
		birth = yes
	}	
	314.6.22 = { # Known year and date
		death = yes
	}
}

# Zhang Su
# Zhang Gui's brother
# Prefect of Xihai County - wanted to fight the Xiongnu when they attacked Western Jin, but was told he was too old
# Later died of grief and anger after hearing that Western Jin collapsed
former_liang_004 = { 
	name= "Su"
	dynasty = dynasty_zhang_liang
	religion="zhengyi"
	culture="han"
	father=former_liang_002
	trait=education_martial_3 # General
	trait=brave
	trait=just
	trait=wrathful
	258.5.28 = { # Unknown
		birth = yes
	}	
	317.5.9 = { # Known year
		death = yes
	}
}

# Zhang Shi (or Yu)
# Zhang Gui's eldest son
# De facto independent warlord in Liang
former_liang_005 = { 
	name= "Shi"
	dynasty = dynasty_zhang_liang
	religion="zhengyi"
	culture="han"
	father=former_liang_003
	trait=education_learning_3	# Liked scholars and stuff
	trait=intellect_good_1 	# Said to be wise and observant since his youth
	trait=arrogant			# Said to be increasingly arrogant as he became more powerful
	trait=calm				# Despite this, said to be wise and observant and listened to his subordinates
	trait=generous			# Generous to others and especially when asking for advice
	271.1.22 = { # Known year
		birth = yes
	}	
	320.6.25 = { # Known year and date
		death = { # Was assassinated by his subordinate Liu Hong
			death_reason = death_murder
		}
	}
}

# Zhang Mao
# Second son of Zhang Gui
# First semi-formal ruler of Former Liang
former_liang_006 = { 
	name= "Mao"
	dynasty = dynasty_zhang_liang
	religion="zhengyi"
	culture="han"
	father=former_liang_003
	trait=education_learning_3	# Liked to learn and stuff
	trait=humble		# Humble personality
	trait=diligent		# Eager to learn
	trait=just			# Seems virtuous
	277.9.29 = { # Known year
		birth = yes
	}	
	324.5.16 = { # Known year
		death = yes
	}
}

# Zhang Su
# Third son of Zhang Gui
former_liang_007 = { 
	name= "Su"
	dynasty = dynasty_zhang_liang
	religion="zhengyi"
	culture="han"
	father=former_liang_003
	279.3.15 = { # Unknown
		birth = yes
	}	
	327.4.29 = { # Unknown
		death = yes
	}
}

# Zhang Jun
# Son of Zhang Shi
former_liang_008 = { 
	name= "Jun"
	dynasty = dynasty_zhang_liang
	religion="zhengyi"
	culture="han"
	father=former_liang_005
	trait=education_learning_3
	trait=beauty_good_2 		# Strange but majestic appearance
	trait=intellect_good_1		# Sharp guy and talented at literature
	trait=diligent				# Diligent in government affairs
	trait=greedy				# Indulgent and greedy
	trait=gluttonous			# Indulgent and greedy
	307.4.1 = { # Known year
		birth = yes
	}	
	346.9.20 = { # Known year
		death = yes
	}
}

# Zhang Zuo
# Eldest son of Zhang Shi but didn't succeed his father for some reason
former_liang_009 = { 
	name= "Zuo"
	dynasty = dynasty_zhang_liang
	religion="zhengyi"
	culture="han"
	father=former_liang_008
	trait=education_diplomacy_4		# Talented at politics and good at flattery
	trait=intellect_good_1			# Smart
	trait=strong					# Said to be strong
	trait=ambitious					# First Former Liang ruler to formally declare a clear break from Jin
	trait=sadistic					# Cruel ruler
	trait=brave						# Brave
	trait=lustful					# *Supposedly* committed incest with his brother's mother/father's concubine, and his brother's nieces (the former's granddaughters (!))
	trait=incestuous
	327.2.10 = { # Known year
		birth = yes
	}	
	355.9.11 = { # Known year and month
		death = { # Was killed in a counter-coup
			death_reason = death_murder
		}
	}
}

# Zhang Chonghua
# Second son of Zhang Shi and heir
former_liang_010 = { 
	name= "Chonghua"
	dynasty = dynasty_zhang_liang
	religion="zhengyi"
	culture="han"
	father=former_liang_008
	trait=education_diplomacy_1		# Nice guy but not really good at anything
	trait=generous					# Generous to a fault
	trait=lazy						# Didn't care about state affairs
	trait=calm						# Peaceful and quiet
	trait=compassionate				# Kind-hearted
	327.11.19 = { # Known year
		birth = yes
	}	
	353.11.2 = { # Known year and month
		death = yes
	}
}

# Zhang Tianxi
# Third son of Zhang Shi and final ruler of Former Liang
former_liang_011 = { 
	name= "Tianxi"
	dynasty = dynasty_zhang_liang
	religion="zhengyi"
	culture="han"
	father=former_liang_008
	trait=education_learning_3		# Literary talents
	trait=poet						# Literary talents
	trait=arbitrary					# Arbitrary ruler, didn't care about governing
	trait=lustful					# Addicted to women
	trait=gluttonous				# Addicted to feasting
	345.11.1 = { # Made him a little older than he was so he could be an adult
		birth = yes
	}	
	406.6.4 = { # Known year
		death = yes
	}
}

# Zhang Yaoliang
# Son of Chonghua and heir
former_liang_012 = { 
	name= "Yaoliang"
	dynasty = dynasty_zhang_liang
	religion="zhengyi"
	culture="han"
	father=former_liang_010
	344.4.3 = { # Known year
		birth = yes
	}	
	355.5.10 = { # Known year, executed by Zhang Zuo
		death = { death_reason = death_execution killer = former_liang_009 }
	}
}

# Zhang Xuanjing
# Second son of Chonghua who came to power as a child after Zhang Zuo got yeeted in a countercoup
former_liang_013 = { 
	name= "Xuanjing"
	dynasty = dynasty_zhang_liang
	religion="zhengyi"
	culture="han"
	father=former_liang_010
	350.1.9 = { # Known year
		birth = yes
	}	
	363.8.25 = { # Known year and month, killed by Zhang Tianxi
		death = {
			death_reason = death_murder_known
			killer = former_liang_011
		}
	}
}



#############################################################
# 
# HU FAMILY 
# Officials under Northern Wei whose hometown was in Anding (modern-day Zhenyuan County, Gansu)
# 
# Done by Cybrxkhan
# 
#############################################################


# Hu Guozhen's grandfather
hu_liang_001 = { 
	name= "Lue"
	dynasty = dynasty_hu_liang
	religion="mahayana"
	culture="han"
	trait=education_martial_2
	395.7.1 = { # Unknown but served the army of Later Qin prince Yao Kui who died in 415???
		birth = yes
	}	
	433.2.21 = { # Unknown
		death = yes
	}
}

# Hu Guozhen's father, marquis of Wushi and later governor of Hezhou
hu_liang_002 = { 
	name= "Shen"
	dynasty = dynasty_hu_liang
	religion="mahayana"
	culture="han"
	father=hu_liang_001
	414.9.19 = { # Unknown but first served as an official(?) of Helian Bobo (died 425, Emperor of the Xiongnu state of Xia), and then Emperor Taiwu of Northern Wei (died 452)
		birth = yes
	}	
	460.7.12 = { # Unknown
		death = yes
	}
}

# Hu Guozhen
# Northern Wei official, father of Empress Dowager Hu, a concubine of Emperor Xuanwu of Northern Wei
hu_liang_003 = { 
	name= "Guozhen"
	dynasty = dynasty_hu_liang
	religion="mahayana"
	culture="han"
	father=hu_liang_002
	trait=education_stewardship_3
	trait=diligent		# Eager to learn
	trait=temperate		# Advocated frugality in government affairs
	trait=just			# Loyal and respectable
	trait=zealous		# Devoted Buddhist
	438.7.22 = { # Known year
		birth = yes
	}
	467.1.1 = {
		add_spouse = hu_liang_004
	}
	518.8.20 = { # Known year
		death = yes
	}
}

# Hu Guozhen's wife, real name unknown
hu_liang_004 = { 
	name= "Fanjing"
	female=yes
	dynasty = dynasty_huangfu_liang
	religion="mahayana"
	culture="han"
	trait=beauty_good_1		# Her daughter was supposedly beautiful
	450.2.8 = { # Unknown, but if we assume she's the mother of Hu Guozhen's known kids, one of her daughters was born in 492
		birth = yes
	}	
	500.2.8 = { # Unknown
		death = yes
	}
}

# Hu Guozhen's son
# Northern Wei official under Emperor Suzong of Northern Wei (ruled 510-528)

	religion="mahayana"

	mother=hu_liang_004

	}

# Hu Guozhen's daughter
# Empress Dowager Hu
hu_liang_006 = { 
	name= "Ling" # Personal name unknown, so I'm using her posthumous name
	female=yes
	dynasty = dynasty_hu_liang
	religion="mahayana"
	culture="han"
	father=hu_liang_003
	mother=hu_liang_004
	trait=beauty_good_3
	trait=shrewd 		# Very literate and good at making quick decisions
	486.2.10 = { # Unknown, but concubine of Emperor Xuanwu (483-515) so I made them roughly the same age
		birth = yes
	}	
	528.5.17 = { # Known date
		death = yes
	}
}

# Hu Zhen's son
# Father of Empress Hu, wife of Emperor Xiaoming of Northern Wei (510-528)
hu_liang_011 = { 
	name= "Sheng"
	dynasty = dynasty_hu_liang
	religion="mahayana"
	culture="han"
	father=hu_liang_008
	mother=hu_liang_009
	trait=education_martial_3	# Initially served as general before becoming governor of Youzhou, then Yingzhou, then Jizhou
	trait=compassionate			# Loved by other officials for good governance
	trait=just					# Places he governed were peaceful and quiet
	trait=calm
	460.11.30 = { # Unknown
		birth = yes
	}	
	529.9.14 = { # Unknown
		death = yes
	}
}

# Hu Zhen's son, who was initially raised to be Hu Guozhen's heir since Guozhen did not have any sons yet

	name= "Sengxi"

	religion="mahayana"
	culture="han"
	father=hu_liang_008
	mother=hu_liang_009

		birth = yes
	}	
	537.6.19 = { # Known year
		death = yes
	}
}

# Hu Guozhen's sister, a well-known nun
hu_liang_013 = { 
	name= "Sengzhi"
	female=yes
	dynasty = dynasty_hu_liang
	religion="mahayana"
	culture="han"
	father=hu_liang_002
	trait=education_learning_4
	trait=devoted
	trait=celibate
	trait=gregarious	# Often sent to preach inside the palace of Emperor Xianwu
	trait=zealous		# Preacher, so... yeah
	trait=diligent		# Did a lot of preaching I guess?
	444.4.4 = { # Unknown
		birth = yes
	}	
	520.8.31 = { # Unknown
		death = yes
	}
}

# Han Mu, General and governor of Shanshan for Northern Wei
# Also known as Han Ba
han_misc_1 = { 
	name= "Mu"
	dynasty = dynasty_han_tarim
	religion="mahayana"
	culture="han"
	422.6.8 = { # Unknown, but was appointed position in 448 so must have been an adult by then 
		birth = yes
	}
	492.1.15 = { # Year is maybe? Not sure if this is reliable but don't have anything else to go by
		death = yes
	}
}

# Usurper in Gaochang from c. 613-620 - possibly might not have even existed
# Real name uknown, so I've used his era name as his name

	name= "Yihe"
	religion="mahayana"
	culture="han"
	582.8.25 = { # Unknown
		birth = yes
	}
	620.1.1 = { # Unknown, but presumably he died in counter coup by the ruling family
		death = yes
	}
}

####################################### Dynasty: 1000050261 #######################################
1800476 = { #苗晉卿 Miao Jinqing or 苗普卿 Miao Puqing* (大唐古朝散大夫行太子内置郎上柱國苗府君墓誌銘). In 743.2.21 demoted to 安康太守. (資治通鑑/卷215) In 744.3.19 made 魏郡太守, 河北采訪處置使 where he spend 3 years. (舊唐書/卷113) Later made 河東太守、河東采訪使. (舊唐書/卷113) 河東太守、河東采訪使 in 748.6.27. (大唐古朝散大夫行太子内置郎上柱國苗府君墓誌銘) Later 撫風郡太守. (舊唐書/卷113) Even later 東京留守. (舊唐書/卷113) Later made 陜州刺史、陜虢兩州防禦使, but refused to take the post and was retired. (舊唐書/卷113) (唐丞相故太保贈太師韓國公苗公墓誌銘) *In 大唐古朝散大夫行太子内置郎上柱國苗府君墓誌銘 the account of descent of Miao clan from Chu mirrors the one from 新唐書, with the exception that all mentions of 晉 are replaced by 普
	dynasty = 1000050261 #Shangdang Miao
	name = "Jinqing_name"
	culture = han
	religion = shangqing
	father = 1800472
	trait = education_diplomacy_4
	trait = diligent
	trait = jinshi
	trait = patient
	trait = intellect_good_1
	685.1.1 = {
		birth=yes
	}
	765.5.21 = {
		death = yes
	}
}

1401070 = { #劉鄩 Liu Xun, posthumous name 武節侯. Son of Liu Rong. (舊五代史/卷23) In 中和 era became an officer under 王敬武, later served 王師範. (舊五代史/卷23) In 898 made 登州刺史. (舊五代史/卷23) In 899 made 淄州刺史 and 行軍司馬. (舊五代史/卷23) 行軍司馬 under 王師範 in 903.2.4, around that time took 兗州. (舊五代史/卷2) In 903.11.2 surrendered to Zhu Quanzhong. (舊五代史/卷2) Soon after made 保大留後. (資治通鑑/卷263) In 909 made 佑國、同州軍兩使留後, soon after made 永平軍節度使, 行大安尹、金州管內觀察使. (舊五代史/卷23) 永平軍節度使 until 913.5.13, on that day made 開封尹，and honoray 鎮南軍節度使. (舊五代史/卷8) In 916.4.19 made 滑州宣義軍節度副大使，知節度事. (舊五代史/卷8) 917.9.29 made 亳州團練使. (資治通鑑/卷270) 918.9.16 made 兗州安撫制置使. (舊五代史/卷9) In 919.10.27 took 兗州. (舊五代史/卷9) In 919.12.8 made 泰寧節度使. (資治通鑑/卷271) 兗州節度使 until 921.6.10, on that day died. (舊五代史/卷10)

cai_0031 = {
	dynasty = cai_bu #步家
	name = "Feiyan_name" #ficitious
	culture = han
	religion = shangqing
	female = yes
	diplomacy = 15
	martial = 4
	stewardship = 10
	intrigue = 10
	learning = 21
	prowess = 5
	trait = education_learning_4
	trait = beauty_good_3
	trait = poet
	trait = lustful
	850.1.1={
		birth=yes
	}
	868.1.1 = {
		add_spouse = cai_0032
	}
	875.1.1 = {
		effect = { set_relation_lover = character:cai_0033 }
	}
	880.1.1={
		death=yes
	}
}

	intrigue = 10

gaoyang_xu_154 = { #許叔冀 Xu Shuji. Son of Xu Qindan. (新唐書/卷073上) 靈昌太守 until 757.8.20, on that day retreated from the city. (資治通鑑/卷219) Later made 河南都知兵馬使，俱兼御史大夫. (資治通鑑/卷219) 青、登等五州節度使 until 758.9.9, on that day made 滑、濮等六州節度使. (資治通鑑/卷220) 滑、濮節度使 until 759.6.16, on that day made 汴州刺史，充滑、汴等七州節度使. luoyang_jia_094 = { #賈耽 Jia Dan, courtesy name 賈敦詩 Jia Dunshi, 魏元靖公 Duke Yuanjing of Wei. Son of Jia Yanzhi. (全唐文/卷0478/左僕射賈耽神道碑) In 751 Jinshi. (神道碑) Later made 大理司直監察殿中侍御史. (神道碑) Later made 檢校繕部員外郎兼太原少尹、侍御史、北都副留守. (神道碑) Later made 汾州刺史 where he spent 7 years [770-779.5.1]. (神道碑) 鴻臚卿 in 779.11.13. (墓誌銘) 鴻臚卿 until 779.12.17, on that day made 梁州刺史、山南西道節度觀察使. (舊唐書/卷12) 山南西道節度使 until 782.12.9, on that day made 檢校工部尚書、兼襄州刺史、御史大夫、山南東道節度使 [until 784.2.19]. (舊唐書/卷12) Former 山南東道節度使 in 784.5.7, on that day made 工部尚書. (舊唐書/卷12) 工部尚書 until 785.7.29, on that day made 兼御史大夫、東都留守、都畿汝州防禦刺使. (舊唐書/卷12) In 786.6.20 made also 東都畿唐、汝、鄧都防禦觀察使. (舊唐書/卷12) 東都畿、唐、鄧、汝等防禦觀察使 until 786.10.7, on that day made 檢校尚書右僕射，兼滑州刺史、義成軍節度、鄭滑等州觀察使. (舊唐書/卷12) 義成軍節度使、檢校右僕射 until 791.5.21, on that day made 左僕射、同中書門下平章事. (舊唐書/卷13) In 805.4.21 made 兼檢校司空. (舊唐書/卷146) When 杜鴻漸 was made 劍南西川節度使 (766.4.10), Ya was made 判官. (舊唐書/卷146) Later made 吏部郎中、諫議大夫. (舊唐書/卷146) 諫議大夫 in 776.1.28, on that day made 給事中、河北宣慰使. (舊唐書/卷146 and 舊唐書/卷11) In 779.1.6 made 洪州刺史、兼御史中丞、江西都團練觀察使. (舊唐書/卷11) 壽州刺史 until 779.7.12, on that day made 江西觀察使. (舊唐書/卷12) 江西觀察使 until 779.7.13, on that day made 陝州長史，充轉運使. linpu_zhang_003 = { #張全義 Zhang Quanyi or 張居言 Zhang Juyan or 張言 Zhang Yan or 張宗奭 Zhang Zongshi. Son of Zhang Cheng. (舊五代史/卷63) 886.12.29 defended Huaizhou against Sun Ru's invasion. (資治通鑑/卷256) In 887.4.16 took Luoyang. (資治通鑑/卷257) 888.3.17 took over Heyang circuit. (資治通鑑/卷257) 河南尹 in 888.5.15. (舊五代史/卷1) 888.5.29 returned to solely rule over Luoyang. (資治通鑑/卷257) In 888.7.13 made 佑國軍節度使. (資治通鑑/卷257) In 892.3.17 made also 河陽節度使. (資治通鑑/卷259) In 892.5.30 made 孟州刺史，充河陽三城節度、孟懷澤觀察等使. (舊唐書/卷20上) 904.6.12 made 天平節度使. (資治通鑑/卷264) 天平軍節度使 until 904.11.15, on that day made 河南尹、許州刺史、忠武軍節度觀察等使. (舊唐書/卷20下) 904.11.15 returned to capital. (資治通鑑/卷265) 904.11.16 made 河南尹兼忠武節度使. (資治通鑑/卷265) 河南尹兼河陽節度使 in 907.6.14 (or 907.6.16), on that day made 魏王. (舊五代史/卷3) By 907.6.16 moved to 河南尹 and 河陽節度使. In 907.9.11 granted name 張宗奭. (資治通鑑/卷266) In 910.9.13 made 西京留守. (資治通鑑/卷267) In 913.11.30 made 西都留守. (資治通鑑/卷268) In 918.2.3 made 西都留守. (資治通鑑/卷270) In 924.3.20 made also 河陽節度使 and 齊王. (舊五代史/卷31) 河南尹 until 925.1.23, on that day made 洛京留守. (舊五代史/卷32) 河南尹兼河陽節度使 until 926.4.8, on that day made 許州節度使. (舊五代史/卷34) 忠武軍節度使 until 926.4.18 (舊五代史/卷34) or 926.4.29, on that day died after refusing to eat for days. (資治通鑑/卷275)

	diplomacy = 8      # Managed complex political coalitions and negotiations
	intrigue = 5       # Relied on others for intelligence but eventually acted on corruption
	stewardship = 6    # Mixed record - ended corruption but allowed warlordism to develop
	father = longxi_li_0963
	mother = 247993
	trait = child_of_concubine_male  # Already present - not counted toward personality limit
	trait = content    # His preference for stability over conflict, avoiding further wars
	trait = trusting   # Initially trusted corrupt officials like Yuan Zai for years
	trait = patient    # Waited years before acting against corruption, preferred diplomatic solutions
	trait = education_martial_3
	disallow_random_traits = yes

		birth = yes
	}

	}

####################################### Dynasty: lujiang_wang_dyn #######################################
lujiang_wang_001 = { #father of Wang Wan and Wang Yu
	dynasty = lujiang_wang_dyn #廬江王氏
	name = "Kuang_name" #ficitious
	culture = han
	religion = jingxue

(資治通鑑/卷221) Later promoted to 絳州刺史. (新唐書/卷125) Later made 戸部侍郎. (新唐書/卷125) Later made 太常卿. (新唐書/卷125) Later made 河南尹, but didn't go and died. (新唐書/卷125) 河南尹 until 764.11.18, on that day died. yanzhou_kong_001 = { #孔勍 Kong Qing, courtesy name 孔鼎文 Kong Wending. During Later Liang made 齊州防禦使. (舊五代史/卷64) Later made 唐鄧節度使. (舊五代史/卷64) Later made 山南東道節度使 [909.10.23]. (舊五代史/卷64) 山南東道節度使 in 919.6.3. (舊五代史/卷9) 襄州節度使、檢校太傅、平章事 in 923.12.30. (舊五代史/卷30) 襄州節度使 until 924.8.12, on that day made 潞州節度使. (舊五代史/卷32) 潞州節度使 until 926.4.18, on that day returned to court. (舊五代史/卷34) Former 澤潞節度使 in 927.4.13, on that day made 河陽節度使. (舊五代史/卷38) Former 河陽節度使 in 928.1.29, on that day made 太子太師 and retired. (舊五代史/卷39) In 932.6.22 died. (舊五代史/卷43)

	854.1.1 = {

(後唐招討使李存進墓碑) 906.3.28 made 知石州軍州事. (後唐招討使李存進墓碑) In 908.2.5 made 石州刺史. (後唐招討使李存進墓碑) In 912.1.22 made 知汾州軍州事. (後唐招討使李存進墓碑) In 914.3.30 made 慈州刺史. (後唐招討使李存進墓碑) 慈州刺史 until 914.12.20, on that day made 沁州刺史. (後唐招討使李存進墓碑) 沁州刺史 until 915.7.15, on that day made 天雄都巡按使. (資治通鑑/卷269) In 919.4.4 made 振武節度使. (後唐招討使李存進墓碑) 振武節度使 until 922.9.24, on that day killed in battle. (舊五代史/卷29)

	religion = jingxue
